title: Item Shop Bugged
body: Every time i go to the shop to buy tiamat the shop takes my money but then i get no item in return, i first thought this was because i had a brain fade but i tested it and it occured 3 more times to me in game. This is a major item for a lot of champions, Riot are you aware of this bug ? It is extremely annoying.

replies.body:
Hi folks,

Thanks for the reports.  What champion were you playing when you were trying to purchase the item?

Mindstar

There's more info at this [Reddit comment](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/3sdnqn/522_patch_bugs_megathread/cwwbnae). Apparently related to item order on the Recommended Items page. It occurs with Shyvana when trying to purchase Tiamat from the Recommended items page.

Just wanted to say thanks again for responding and to Verrafied for initially reporting the issue.  We were able to find out about the issue thanks to you guys and we're now working to get it fixed up :)

Cheers!
Mindstar
were you playing shyvanna? cause i had the same problem and it was with shyvanna
Yeah, Same thing happened to me, I tried buying titanic Hydra and it ate all my gold. I tried buying it twice, lost 7200 gold, and we lost the game.

Can confirm, buying Tiamat does nothing but eat your gold. Riot please disable this item until it's fixed.

Edit: New info at this [Reddit comment](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/3sdnqn/522_patch_bugs_megathread/cwwbnae). Apparently related to item order on the Recommended Items page.
